data.oai_dc:dc: Phytoplankton pigment concentrations measured by HPLC during POLARSTERN cruise PS99.1

We present data set on the concentrations of various phytoplankton pigments (unit: mg/m³) from discrete samples measured using High Pressure Liquid Chromatography (HPLC) during the cruises PS99.1 on R/V POLARSTERN in the Fram Strait.

19-Butanoyloxyfucoxanthin, 19-Hexanoyloxyfucoxanthin, AC3, Alloxanthin, alpha-Carotene, Antheraxanthin, Arctic Amplification, ARK-XXX/1.1, Astaxanthin, beta-Carotene, Chlorophyll a, Chlorophyll b, Chlorophyll c1+c2, Chlorophyll c3, Chlorophyllide a, CT, CTD/Rosette, CTD-RO, DATE/TIME, DEPTH, water, Diadinoxanthin, Diatoxanthin, Dinoxanthin, Divinyl chlorophyll a, Divinyl chlorophyll b, Echinenone, Event label, FRAM, FRontiers in Arctic marine Monitoring, Fucoxanthin, Gyroxanthin diester, High Performance Liquid Chromatography (HPLC), LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, Lutein, Mg-2,4-divinyl pheoporphyrin a5 monomethyl ester, Neoxanthin, Norwegian Sea, Peridinin, Pheophorbide a, Pheophytin a, Pheophytin b, Polarstern, Prasinoxanthin, PS99/002-1, PS99/005-1, PS99/006-2, PS99/007-1, PS99/008-1, PS99/010-1, PS99/011-1, PS99/012-1, PS99/014-1, PS99/017-1, PS99/019-1, PS99.1, PS99.1-track, Pyropheophorbide a, Pyropheophytin a, Station label, Underway cruise track measurements, Violaxanthin, Zeaxanthin
